QuestData.Title: Assault on Violet Hold: Into the Violet Hold
QuestData.Description: The Violet Hold contains some of the Lich King's most powerful servants, and is at risk of being overrun by Legion agents. We must go there and thwart the demons before any of the prisoners can be set free.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the leader of the Assault on Violet Hold.

Objectives.Objective: Defeat the leader of the Assault on Violet Hold
